title: The Beavers break through
creator_credit: Bristol-Cine Society and Boy Scouts Association (Great Britain)
brief_description: Shows the activities of a patrol of British boy scouts, setting up camp, preparing meals, constructing an aerial ropeway across a creek. A girl hiker who has sprained her ankle provides an opportunity for the scouts to work together in a rescue exercise.
